#include <Arduino.h>

#include <FastLED.h>

#define NUM_LEDS 79

byte coordsY[NUM_LEDS] = { 247, 207, 167, 128, 88, 48, 8, 8, 8, 8, 48, 88, 128, 128, 128, 247, 207, 167, 128, 88, 48, 8, 8, 8, 8, 48, 88, 128, 128, 128, 167, 207, 247, 8, 48, 88, 128, 167, 207, 247, 255, 255, 247, 207, 167, 128, 88, 47, 8, 207, 247, 255, 255, 223, 183, 143, 128, 112, 88, 48, 8, 0, 0, 40, 247, 207, 167, 128, 88, 48, 8, 48, 88, 128, 167, 207, 247, 183, 183 };
byte angles[NUM_LEDS] = { 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, 21, 22, 24, 22, 20, 17, 16, 15, 13, 16, 19, 22, 25, 27, 29, 32, 35, 38, 37, 35, 30, 27, 24, 26, 24, 22, 52, 51, 49, 47, 44, 42, 42, 53, 67, 80, 80, 78, 76, 75, 73, 72, 98, 106, 110, 112, 111, 108, 103, 99, 94, 88, 86, 87, 90, 93, 97, 116, 113, 111, 109, 107, 106, 105, 107, 110, 112, 115, 117, 119, 115, 114 };
